name: skate movements 2
description:
In the second volume of this series, the animation is based on the first 900 made by Tony Hawk.

480 px x 360 px / 3.4 sec / 25 fps / 2021

-
The movements of the human body while skateboarding are art and poetry in motion, nowave ballet on a board with wheels. This will be a series of animations that focuses on the movements of the human body on a skate without the skate.
